tool_description: API for creating generating PDF invoices and converting HTML to PDF files. API returns base64 outputs.
name: invoice-pdf-api
title: invoice-pdf-api

api_list.name: Fill docx template and return as PDF
api_list.description: The endpoint takes docx template in base64 format and returns pdf in base64.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://invoice-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com/pdf/fill-docx-to-pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "invoice-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate an invoice
api_list.code:

url = "https://invoice-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com/invoices/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "invoice-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
